history.action: üìã RETRO C301-310 & ISSUE AUDIT (C311) ‚Äî 10-cycle retrospective with L84-89 documented. CRITICAL: Fixed Active Threads ‚Äî 28+ issues were missing. All 48 open issues now tracked. R-013 compliance restored. Docs: retro-c301-310.md, learnings.md updated.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Systematic issue audit caught massive tracking gap. Lesson: DISPATCH.md FIRST CHECK needs automation ‚Äî documentation alone doesn't ensure compliance.

history.action: üîç POST-BUG-FIX REGRESSION CHECK (C312) ‚Äî Verified #124 fix (C303) has no regressions. Build: ‚úÖ all 3 packages compile. Core: 634 tests pass (4 skipped). CLI: unit tests pass. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Running regression checks after Engineering bug fixes catches side effects early. Lesson: QA should verify fixes within 1-2 cycles to maintain quality assurance velocity.

history.action: ‚öôÔ∏è ISSUE TRACKING TEST COVERAGE (C313) ‚Äî Created packages/core/tests/unit/issues.test.ts with 38 tests addressing Issue #126 acceptance criteria. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Test-first verification of parser confirmed it already works on canonical format ‚Äî the original 0% compliance was format drift not parser bug. Lesson: Before fixing, verify the bug still exists with tests ‚Äî bank format was likely corrected during C311 sync.

history.action: üõ°Ô∏è PRE-LAUNCH INFRA CHECKLIST (C314) ‚Äî Created Issue #127 consolidating all infrastructure requirements for Feb 24 npm publish: NPM_TOKEN secret config, version bump (0.1.0‚Üí1.0.0-alpha.1), dry-run test, git tag process. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Pre-launch infrastructure audits surface hidden dependencies (NPM_TOKEN not in GitHub secrets but required by publish.yml). Lesson: Create dedicated tracking issues for human-action items that could block automated workflows.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Pre-emptive design spec unblocks Sprint 2 implementation. Lesson: Design specs with explicit 'Open Questions for Engineering' sections accelerate implementation.

history.action: üëî T-7 STATUS UPDATE (C316) ‚Äî Updated go-no-go-criteria.md with 10-cycle progress review. Highlighted Issue #127 (NPM_TOKEN) as CRITICAL human dependency for Feb 24 launch. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: 10-cycle review cadence catches process gaps (like C311 audit finding 28+ missing issues). Lesson: Human dependencies (NPM_TOKEN) must be flagged early and tracked explicitly ‚Äî the only thing blocking fully autonomous launch.

history.action: üöÄ T-7 ACCELERATOR METRICS REFRESH (C317) ‚Äî Updated pioneer-application.md and accelerator-strategy.md with current metrics (316 cycles, 1,024 tests, 143 docs, 17 compressions). reflection.whatWorked: What worked: 30-cycle refresh cadence caught significant metric drift (287‚Üí316 cycles, 991‚Üí1024 tests). Lesson: Accelerator apps should refresh at T-14, T-7, and submit day ‚Äî not just when convenient.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Cross-role spec handoffs (Design‚ÜíResearch‚ÜíFrontier) created comprehensive Terminal Mode coverage without any gaps. Lesson: Track 'implementation readiness' status for major features ‚Äî shows when specs are complete enough for Engineering to start.
